channel.title: Tools on F#-ening
channel.description: Recent content in Tools on F#-ening

item.title: Unboxing and Exploration
item.description: Naive Observations Unlike most other languages I learned, there wasn’t many surprises for me with F#. This was mostly because I was eased into the languages through Scott’s book. I didn’t intend to learn it while reading it, but still had to comprehend what the codes were trying to tell me. While the book’s wisdom is easily transferrable to other languages, it’s the beauty of the syntax which led me to explore the language further.
